name: doggone (itch)
description:
a boy's dog is missing. he must embark on a quest to find his four-legged friend and potentially discover the secrets behind the robot overlords that lurk in the shadows...

submission for the UT Game Jam 2020 by Team 25

  • Daniel Jones - programmer
  • Lauren Head - artist/animator
  • Michael Donovan - artist/writer
  • Josh Daniel - sound designer/writer

special thanks to our mentors Sage and Saru! :)
